channel.title: Rune Crossbows
channel.description:
I was watching on Google, people hitting 60+ with these little things, Woow. 2nd strongest weapon? So I got my friend to do it, he has 96 ranged ;) He got the bow, got some ranged pots, and Dragon tipped bolts. He had full Karils and Fury, and Ranger/Robin. He was telling me he hit 63 max so far.
What do you think, are they over-powered? Pk with it, 2 hit people? Maybe 1 hit.

item.title: Rune Crossbows
item.dc:creator: @MybBob MybBob
item.description:
@MybBob wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

I can hit a 33-33 with dds and my str is 87, with 99 str the max would be about 40-50 with 1 hit so you could hit 45-45, 1 hit ko. The dark bow is a little different, if you use dragon arrows with 99 range and all the bonus available you can hit like a 50 with 1 arrow only.

Oh funny, I thought that the max hp was 99 ?

So you can 1 hit a level 126 with 2 45’s ;o

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Crossbows
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

Well, with the onyx tip bolt special then?

The max i hit with a rune cbow was a 29 with Dragonstone Bolts (e)

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Crossbows
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

No, it just has a side effect which causes something, e.g enchanted emerald bolts (emerald tipped mith bolts) poison your victim, the poison is much quicker than a dds poison and it hits 5-6. The ruby bolts effect is that it takes some of your hp or something and hits the other guy, can’t remember. Rune cbows are 30k right now, if you make them yourself then it’s like 15k.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Crossbows
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

If a bolt is enchanted, does it hit more?

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Crossbows
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

If your friend hit a 63 with Dragonstone bolts, i wonder what he would hit with Onyx Tipped bolts. (They’re 25kea at world 2

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Crossbows
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

RuneHQ’s prices have never, ever been right. Rune crossbow was 50-120k when I use to be a member, and since they got the update, they where bound to go up quite a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Crossbows
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:16, topic:132035”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=182848.msg1665326#msg1665326 date=1186789210]
honestly you people under estimate the dds… yes a rune cbow can hit 64 or 65 but someone with 96 str with a dds could spec 33,33 with the right equipment… or with dharoks you can hit 65’s aswell. im just saying all the str people out there think it is unfair because rangers have a k0 now…
[/quote]Nobody under estimates the DDS, and yes, you can hit 33’s. But the possibility of hitting those double 33’s is very slim. Dharok’s isn’t overpowered because you have to have low hp left to hit those hits. Trust me, if I was a member I would have a Rune crossbow in the wild ;)[/quote]

how much are they?

EDIT-

Street Price:

25.0 - 35.0 K gp

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Crossbows
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:12, topic:132035”]honestly you people under estimate the dds… yes a rune cbow can hit 64 or 65 but someone with 96 str with a dds could spec 33,33 with the right equipment… or with dharoks you can hit 65’s aswell. im just saying all the str people out there think it is unfair because rangers have a k0 now…[/quote]Nobody under estimates the DDS, and yes, you can hit 33’s. But the possibility of hitting those double 33’s is very slim. Dharok’s isn’t overpowered because you have to have low hp left to hit those hits. Trust me, if I was a member I would have a Rune crossbow in the wild

item.title: Rune Crossbows
item.dc:creator: @MybBob MybBob
item.description:
@MybBob wrote:

Yeah it might be slower, but say the max I’ve seen someone hit with a msb is 24, so is someone hits 24, 24,24 with a msb and its spec, then its only just capping what a rune c bow does with 1 hit…

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Crossbows
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Then the downside to them, is they’re slower.

item.title: Rune Crossbows
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

I saw a very good test on the rs forums about this, they were comparing rune cbow and magic shortbow with an account who had lvl 70 range. Normally with 70 range your max with iron arrows would be 10, they hit a 10 without any prayers or range pots and then they tested iron bolts. It hit a 14, meaning that rune cbows are 40% stronger than msb.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Crossbows
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I think they have very good potential… but the cost for the ammo is just too much usually.
